com.adobe.cq.social.scoring.api

Interface ScoringService


  • public interface ScoringService
    Scoring service exposes operations like getPoints needed by components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the path of a score resource.

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        long getScore(ResourceResolver resourceResolver,
              java.lang.String userId,
              Resource componentResource,
              Resource scoreRuleResource)
       throws RepositoryException
        Retrieves score specified by scoreName for user.
        Parameters:
        resourceResolver - - resolver used to read the resources
        userId - - the user's userid
        componentResource - - the resource where the scoring rule was applied
        scoreRuleResource - - resource of score to be retrieved
        Returns:
        score of the user
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - thrown if unable to retrieve the score

      • getTopScores

        java.util.List<UserScore> getTopScores(ResourceResolver resolver,
                                       Resource componentResource,
                                       Resource scoreRuleResource,
                                       int offset,
                                       int size,
                                       java.util.List<SearchSortField> sortFields)
                                throws RepositoryException
        Get the top scores for a scoring rule at a location
        Parameters:
        resolver - - resolver used to search and read resources
        componentResource - - the resource where the scoring rule is
        scoreRuleResource - - resource of scoring rule
        offset - - offset of list
        size - - number of items to return
        sortFields - - set to null or empty List for the default of sorting by scores and then by userid in descending order
        Returns:
        a list of UserScore objects in the order specified
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - thrown if unable to retrieve scores

      • getTotalNumberOfScores

        long getTotalNumberOfScores(ResourceResolver resolver,
                            Resource componentResource,
                            Resource scoreRuleResource)
                     throws RepositoryException
        Get to number of scores for a scoring rule at a location
        Parameters:
        resolver - - resolver used to search and read resources
        componentResource - - the resource where the scoring rule is
        scoreRuleResource - - resource of scoring rule
        Returns:
        the number of scores
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - thrown if unable to retrieve scores

      • saveScore

        void saveScore(ResourceResolver resourceResolver,
               java.lang.String userId,
               Resource componentResource,
               Resource scoreRuleResource,
               long scoreValue)
        throws RepositoryException,
               PersistenceException
        Saves score specified by scoreName for user.
        Parameters:
        resourceResolver - - resolver of the user whose score needs to be retrieved
        userId - - the user's userid
        componentResource - - the resource where the scoring rule was applied
        scoreRuleResource - - name of score to be retrieved
        scoreValue - - score value, in the form of an increment, to save
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - thrown if unable to save the score
        PersistenceException - thrown if unable to save the score

      • getScoreResourcePath

        java.lang.String getScoreResourcePath(ResourceResolver resourceResolver,
                                      java.lang.String userId,
                                      Resource componentResource,
                                      Resource scoreRuleResource)
                               throws RepositoryException
        Returns the path of a score resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceResolver - - resolver of the user whose score needs to be retrieved
        userId - - the user's userid
        componentResource - - the resource where the scoring rule was applied
        scoreRuleResource - - name of score to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the path of score resource
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if unable to calculate the score path
